testcase.classname: US_005_Login page should not be accessible with invalid credentials
testcase.name: TC_001_User cannot login with invalid username validating the error message
testcase.system-out: When user goes to "GmiBank_HomePage"........................................passed Then user clicks Sign In dropdown menu......................................passed Then user clicks Sign In link...............................................passed Then user enters an "invalid_username" to username text box.................passed Then user enters a "valid_passwordd" to password text box...................passed Then user clicks Sign In button.............................................passed And user sees an error_message..............................................passed
